description.en:
Midnight Mess Scan Summary:   
Jeonghan meets his cousin Iljo, who he almost forgot existed, at his uncle's funeral. Feeling sympathy for the impoverished Iljo, Jeonghan impulsively suggests to live together, which he soon regrets.   
  
"What are you doing?"   
"……."   
"What do you have to say for yourself."   
  
He asked because he discovered Iljo secretly tying to kiss him while he was asleep. Jeonghan attempts to kick out Iljo, but, in the end, fails to do so. Instead, he asks how Iljo can get rid of his unrequited feelings.   
  
"Just kiss me once."   
"If I do that, will that help you like me less?"   
  
On the pretext of sympathy, Jeonghan slowly gave his heart to Iljo. Before he knows it, he finds himself to be sexually involved and possessive over him…  
  
  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
  
  
At Iljo’s father's funeral, Jeonghan meets his cousin Lee Iljo, who he had forgotten even existed. Sympathizing for his cousin’s impoverished situation, he impulsively asks him to move into his home not knowing he was going to regret his decision.   
   
"What do you think you're doing?"  
“…..”  
“Have you any excuse?”   
  
He asked upon discovering llcho secretly trying to kiss him while he was asleep. Jeonghan attempts to drive Iljo out but eventually fails to do so and asks Ilcho how he can rid those unrequited feelings that are still lingering.   
  
“Just kiss me once.”  
  
“Will that help you like me less?”  
  
Out of sympathy, Jeonghan gave his heart out to Lee Iljo only to become sexually involved and possessive over him.  
  
En Español por Meraki   
||  
  
Jeonghan se encuentra con su primo Lee Iljo, de quien casi había olvidado su existencia, en el funeral de su tío. Sintiendo simpatía por el pobre Iljo, Jeonghan le sugiere impulsivamente que vivan juntos, de lo cual se arrepiente pronto.   
“¿Qué estás haciendo?”  
”……”  
”¿Qué tienes que decir en tu defensa?”  
Preguntó porque descubrió a Iljo intentando besarlo en secreto mientras dormía. Jeonghan intenta echar a Iljo, pero, al final, no lo logra. En cambio, le pregunta a Iljo cómo puede deshacerse de sus sentimientos no correspondidos.   
“Solo bésame una vez.”   
“Si hago eso, ¿ayudará a que te guste menos?”  
Con el pretexto de la simpatía, Jeonghan le entrega su corazón a Iljo lentamente. Antes de saberlo, ya se encuentra sexualmente involucrado y siendo posesivo con el...||
